creation(tag=meme_QuesterMeme) ->During a great period of unrest, [deity0_name] proved [deity0_possessive] worth by partaking in a great undertaking, a quest to end all quests.
episode(uses=1,tag=meme_QuesterMeme) ->Upon completing [deity0_possessive] quest, [deity0_name] began an age of enlightenment, and created the first [altarRoomLabel].
intro(tag=meme_QuesterMeme) ->[deity0_name] created [place_summary] [place_name], a hidden site, that only the most worthy could ever find.
conflict(tag=meme_QuesterMeme) ->A [foeLeader] tried their hardest to find this sacred site, leaving a trail of blood behind [foeLeader_objective].
founderJoin(tag=meme_QuesterMeme) ->A great quester named [founderName] arose, and [founder_possessive] began a quest to find, and protect, this sacred site from the wrath of [foeSoldiers].

victory(tag=meme_QuesterMeme) ->[founderName] and the [memberNamePlural] undertake a great journey, eventually reaching the sacred site, and ending the wrath of [foeLeader]. As a reward, [deity0_name] built a grand [altarRoomLabel] there, and appointed [foeLeader] as the first leader.

setup(tag=meme_QuesterMeme) ->In order to save [founder_possessive] village, [founderName] began a great quest. [founderName] journeyed far, and dealt with many dangers, but eventually [founder_pronoun] reached [place_summary] [place_name], and put an end to [foeLeader].
